headline: Mizuho Securities Maintains ‘Outperform’ Rating on Micron Technology, Inc. (MU); Raises PT
summary: Billionaire Kerr Neilson has bought over $81 million worth of shares in Micron Technology, Inc. (NASDAQ:MU), representing 4.72% of his stock portfolio, securing the company a spot in Billionaire Kerr Neilson’s 10 Stock Picks with Huge Upside Potential. On June 26, 2025, Mizuho Securities raised its price target on Micron Technology, Inc. (NASDAQ:MU) from $130 […]
